medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms in the proband began with increased pigmentation noted around 6 months of age. At 12 months, following a gastrointestinal illness, he was found comatose. Subsequent hypoglycemic episodes occurred at 21 months after upper respiratory tract symptoms. The sibling exhibited increased pigmentation from 4 months of age and was diagnosed with adrenal insufficiency at 8 months after a short Synacthen test.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Both siblings diagnosed with FGD; proband had gastrointestinal illness preceding the first episode of unresponsiveness.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of adrenal insufficiency. The siblings are from nonconsanguineous parents of East Asian and South African origin.
